title: Baseline Validation Result
description: Represents the outcome of a nightly or manual baseline validation operation, including structure checks, snapshot verification, and audit evidence.

schema_version.description: Version of the evidence schema used for this record.

evidence_type.description: Type identifier for this evidence structure.

timestamp_utc.description: UTC timestamp when validation was completed.

workflow.description: GitHub workflow or CI pipeline responsible for the validation.

script.description: Name or relative path of the script that produced this evidence.

status.description: Overall validation outcome. 'Partial' is allowed for incomplete runs.

results.description: Detailed per-check results from the baseline validation process.

check.description: The name of the validation check performed.

details.description: Optional notes, failure reason, or context.

summary.description: Optional numeric summary of check results.

notes.description: Human-readable notes, recommendations, or post-run comments.
